data.what_is:
Experience Marketing Automation Powered With Actionable Artificial Intelligence - Get AiTrillion!

AiTrillion is the first-ever SaaS-based Artificial Intelligence enabled - all-in-one marketing platform for eCommerce sellers.  It's 11+ customer engagement channels integrated with analytics built for the eCommerce industry, we at AiTrillion specialize at connecting the dots between millions of customers across 175+ countries.

Everything you are looking for is packed under one roof with its Integrated & Innovative features.
Email Marketing Automation
Loyalty Rewards Program
Product Reviews + Q&A
Web Push Notifications
Affiliate Marketing
Recurring Memberships
Form Builder
Ai Workflow Automation
Smart Popups
Announcement Bar
Product Recommendation
data.product_description: AiTrillion is an Intelligent Marketing Cloud, built for the e-commerce world. With AiTrillion, companies can orchestrate campaigns across channels like push, email, in-app messaging, and, with auto-optimization towards higher conversions powered by machine learning. Traditionally, marketing clouds are a way too expensive to implement, hard to learn and of-course rule-based. At AiTrillion, we have built an enterprise solution that is easier to use, elegantly designed, fully integrated and is learning-based.

initial_reviews.review_title: A must have Sales & Marketing Automation Platform
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about AiTrillion?
Before Aitrillion, we used Stamped.io on their enterprise plan for 4 years before deciding to migrate to Aitrillion.

It would have been great if we had known about Aitrillion earlier.

For review and loyalty services, the most important concern isn't just the features but also ensuring they don't slow down your site.

With Stamped.io, we had to contact them almost every year with evidence from site performance tests, asking them to optimize their server hosting. Stamped.io was causing high TTFB and slowing down our site, especially with WooCommerce. Unfortunately, no action was taken, leading to our decision to migrate to Aitrillion out of frustration.

Our first experience migrating from Stamped.io to Aitrillion was the seamless and professional support we received, making the transition hassle-free.

Secondly, despite Aitrillion being an all-in-one sales and marketing automation platform with many great features, it did not slow down our site at all. In fact, our site speed improved significantly.

Thirdly, the professional support from Aitrillion is prompt and efficient, whether via email, live chat, or WhatsApp. When we encountered a problem, it was resolved within 1 to 2 days. Special thanks to Reena, who has been incredibly helpful to us.

What do you dislike about AiTrillion?
There is nothing to dislike about Aitrillion. It is a comprehensive Sales and Marketing Automation Platform perfect for any successful e-commerce business.

What problems is AiTrillion solving and how is that benefiting you?
A comprehensive Sales and Marketing Automation Platform perfect for any successful e-commerce business

all_reviews.review_title: A must have Sales & Marketing Automation Platform
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about AiTrillion?
Before Aitrillion, we used Stamped.io on their enterprise plan for 4 years before deciding to migrate to Aitrillion.

It would have been great if we had known about Aitrillion earlier.

For review and loyalty services, the most important concern isn't just the features but also ensuring they don't slow down your site.

With Stamped.io, we had to contact them almost every year with evidence from site performance tests, asking them to optimize their server hosting. Stamped.io was causing high TTFB and slowing down our site, especially with WooCommerce. Unfortunately, no action was taken, leading to our decision to migrate to Aitrillion out of frustration.

Our first experience migrating from Stamped.io to Aitrillion was the seamless and professional support we received, making the transition hassle-free.

Secondly, despite Aitrillion being an all-in-one sales and marketing automation platform with many great features, it did not slow down our site at all. In fact, our site speed improved significantly.

Thirdly, the professional support from Aitrillion is prompt and efficient, whether via email, live chat, or WhatsApp. When we encountered a problem, it was resolved within 1 to 2 days. Special thanks to Reena, who has been incredibly helpful to us.

What do you dislike about AiTrillion?
There is nothing to dislike about Aitrillion. It is a comprehensive Sales and Marketing Automation Platform perfect for any successful e-commerce business.

What problems is AiTrillion solving and how is that benefiting you?
A comprehensive Sales and Marketing Automation Platform perfect for any successful e-commerce business
